name: Pixel Highway
description:
Old chauffeur, said turn on the turn!

The new 3D pixel style racing game and you bump!

Accelerate accelerate accelerate again, ahead of the competition, and strive to first, enjoy the speed and passion! Coaster every day, to win the global ranking, rival!

Game Features:

1 is very easy to get started, right and left to avoid the other vehicles to control the direction, there is no difficulty

2 ultra-fast speed, need good control, the slightest mistake, may have overturned

3 magnet props to help you collect coins easier to buy a car depends on it

4 missile props, crush all opponents, the barrier boom level, the enemy fried heaven, cock, right?

5 realistic physics effects, collision so wonderful


Come and developers speed up a world of PK!


(From Var3D Studio)
